sense.gloss: way (of living, proper conduct, etc.), moral principles
report (of news), reporting, news, information, (media) coverage
tool, implement, instrument, utensil, apparatus, device
prefectures (of Japan), largest administrative divisions of Japan: Tokyo-to, Osaka-fu, Kyoto-fu, Hokkaido and the remaining prefectures
water supply, water service, waterworks, tap water
dojo, hall used for martial arts training
manda (place of Buddhist practice or meditation, esp. the place under the bodhi tree where Buddha attained enlightenment)
highway (esp. one existing from the Edo period), main road

x: 出世街道・しゅっせかいどう

sense.gloss: path (e.g. to one's goal), way, process, route, road
the way back, the way home, return trip
excessive, exorbitant, unreasonable, outrageous, unfair, unjust
way, set of practices, rules for conducting oneself
administrative region of Japan (Tokaido, Tosando, etc.)
